snippet.title: Arcade Game: Three Stooges In Brides Is Brides (1984 Mylstar) 3-Player Co-Op
snippet.description:
A Shooting/Food Fight arcade video game based on the classic TV show where you play any of the 3 famous actors from the famous comedy TV series and rescue the three brides, Cora, Nora and Dora from the evil Doctor, I.M.Acad M.D. The Following Levels are:
1. The Office

2. The Parlor

3. The Kitchen

4. The Singers

5. The Art Gallery

6. The Police Station

7. The Laboratory

You must pick a respectively colored key in each of the seven scenes and exit the room. Each scene is repreated in all 4 levels of difficulty. All 3 keys must be picked up before exiting to the next level.  During the game, you grab pies to throw at villians or cops. Pick Up hammers to hit villians or cops and use them to break furniture to search for keys.

Note: Used invinciblity cheat after down to last life, I'm controlling all 3 players at the same time.
